item.title: Stocks erase earlier losses in thin trading the day after Christmas: Live updates
item.description: Thursday's action came after a solid Christmas Eve for the S&P 500.

item.title: Morgan Stanley unveils favorite telecom and networking equipment stocks for 2025
item.description: The Wall Street investment bank expects its top pick to rally more than 30%.

item.title: Kremlin warns against speculation that Russia shot down Azerbaijan Airlines flight
item.description: Thirty-eight of the 67 on board died when the Embraer 190 crashed near the city of Aktau, Kazakhstan.

item.title: Manmohan Singh, India's 'reluctant' prime minister, dies aged 92
item.description: Manmohan Singh was an economist-turned-politician who also served as the governor of the central bank.

item.title: An options strategy to generate income on this ‘Dog of the S&P 500’ – and perhaps buy it cheap
item.description: This real estate investment trust has had a tough 2024, and it’s a prime candidate for a cash-covered put strategy.
